32#ifndef _LINUX_DELAY_H_
33#define _LINUX_DELAY_H_
34
35#include <sys/param.h>
36#include <sys/kernel.h>
37#include <sys/proc.h>
38
39#include <machine/param.h>
40
41#define MAX_UDELAY_MS 5
42
43static inline void
44udelay(unsigned int usec)
45{
46 DELAY(usec);
47}
48
49static inline void
50usleep_range(unsigned long minimum, unsigned long maximum __unused)
51{
52 DELAY(minimum);
53}
54
55static inline void
56mdelay(unsigned int msec)
57{
58
59 if (msec < MAX_UDELAY_MS)
60 udelay(msec * 1000);
61 else
62 while (msec--)
63 udelay(1000);
64}
65
66static inline void
67msleep(unsigned int msec)
68{
69 if (cold ||
70 ((hz < 1000) && (msec < (1000/hz))))
71 mdelay(msec);
72 else
73 (void)kpause("lnxmslep", false, mstohz(msec), NULL);
74}
75
76static inline void
77ndelay(unsigned int nsec)
78{
79
80 DELAY((nsec + 999) / 1000);
81}
82
83#endif /* _LINUX_DELAY_H_ */
84
